messages.subject: Okita Souji and Saitou Hajime
messages.msgSnippet: I have some information about Okita Souji and I ll pick more up about Saitou Hajime, you may correct me if I m wrong, I think Okita had entered the dojo at age
messages.messageBody:
I have some information about Okita Souji and I'll pick more up about
Saitou Hajime, you may correct me if I'm wrong, I think Okita had
entered the dojo at age 6. I forget the rest, fill me in on this.
